channel.title: Anyone help me stop the dfs from floating and make it walk with you?
channel.description: well on my server on of the many problems in trying to fix is the dfs, all it does is flaots at the side of you while you walk, can someone tell me, or link me a tut that with make it attrach to my guys arm so it walks with him not just floating next to him?
